More information

Install instructions For Android users!

Go to Google Drive and tap on Gacha Neon.apk. The installation will start.

⚠ Attention How to fix "app not installed" (Link)

Dellt dev, the author of Gacha Redux, told me how to solve the "can't install" bug. Thank you very much.

  1. Go to your device settings and tap Apps & Notifications (or Apps in older versions of Android).
  2. Tap the three dots in the upper-right corner.
  3. Tap Special access.
  4. Tap Install unknown apps.
  5. Tap Chrome (or whichever web browser you use)
  6. Move Allow from this source to the On position.

If you try this and it doesn't work, comment with a screenshot of the error.
